thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com | 19 of 40
thread.title: - Lisa Kunz

author: - Lisa Kunz
title: - Lisa Kunz
text: I found out about this source for Italian. Coffee and espresso machines, Importika/Whole Lattee Love, after using a machine purchased through this company while visiting a relative. That machine makes morning coffee a highlight of the day. They have been using their machine ( a top of the line Gaggia) for years. We purchased one three months ago, and have not regretted it. It makes a single. Up from beans ground for each shot. I like the fact that it does not create pods for the landfill. This company has many models and brands. They can give advice on the right machine, depending what customers need. They have a number of YouTube instructional videos. Their customer service was perfect.
